caption.p: ( a) Transmission spectrum of a hard-clad multimode silica optical fibre with the plastic cladding removed (black line), and after (red line) immersion into a porphyrin dye compound; ( b) absorption spectrum calculated from Figure 4a [ 37, 42]; Reprinted from [ 37] under creative common free licence ( http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
